name: The columns Name - Role - Requestor show ellipsis when the value doesn't fit

children.description: Given a web browser is at the WeCruitIO New Campaign page
When the user creates a new campaign with long values on Name
And the user click on save button
Then the user should be redirected towards "Pagina"
And the last campaign created be the user should have ellipsis on the Name values
Given a web browser is at the WeCruitIO New Campaign page
When the user creates a new campaign with long values on Role
And the user click on save button
Then the user should be redirected towards "Pagina"
And the last campaign created be the user should have ellipsis on the Role values
Given a web browser is at the WeCruitIO New Campaign page
When the user creates a new campaign with long values on Requestor
And the user click on save button
Then the user should be redirected towards "Pagina"
And the last campaign created be the user should have ellipsis on the Requestor values

title: The columns Name - Role - Requestor show ellipsis when the value doesn't fit
backgroundTitle: A web browser is at WeCruit "Campaign List"  page and the list displayed contains campaigns

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given a web browser is at the WeCruitIO New Campaign page
When the user creates a new campaign with long values on <column>
And the user click on save button
Then the user should be redirected towards "Pagina"
And the last campaign created be the user should have ellipsis on the <column> values
